scripts.Start Development (F10): clear && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.Build & Run - Prod (Ctrl + F9): clear && NODE_ENV=production npx webpack --env buildType=production --mode production & npx babel --extensions '.tsx,.ts,.jsx,.js' src --ignore src/components,src/config,src/migrations,src/models,src/public,src/seeders,src/tests -d dist && NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js
scripts.Build & Run - Dev (Ctrl + F10): clear && NODE_ENV=development npx webpack --env buildType=development --mode development & NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.Seed: clear && cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.Undo-Seed: clear && cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all
scripts.Refresh-Seed: clear && cd src && npm run Undo-Seed && npm run Seed
scripts.Migrate: clear && cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.Undo-Migrate: clear && cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.Clean-Slate: clear && npm run Undo-Migrate && npm run Migrate
scripts.Clean Slate with Data: clear && npm run Clean-Slate && npm run Seed
